finishAgentAct

protected void finishAgentAct(Agent agent,
                              float dt)
Method is invoked each time agent finishes its action

Parameters:
agent - agent that just finishing acting on response of time step
dt - time step value

                             float dt)
Method is invoked each time agent starts its action

Parameters:
agent - agent that is going to on response of time step
dt - time step value
